mapper.select: SELECT CRJ_EMP_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE CRJ_CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO ,TITLE ,CNT ,MY_TITLE FROM CHAT_ROOM JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE CRJ_EMP_NO = #{empNo} ) ON (CHAT_ROOM_NO = CRJ_CHAT_ROOM_NO)

SELECT C.CHAT_ROOM_NO ,C.CNT FROM CHAT_ROOM C, ( SELECT A.CRJ_CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN A JOIN ( SELECT * FROM CHAT_ROOM_JOIN WHERE CRJ_EMP_NO = #{openUser}) B ON (A.CRJ_CHAT_ROOM_NO = B.CRJ_CHAT_ROOM_NO) WHERE A.CRJ_EMP_NO = #{targetUser}) D WHERE C.CHAT_ROOM_NO = D.CRJ_CHAT_ROOM_NO

SELECT emp_no, emp_cmp_id, emp_name, emp_picpath, emp_pass, emp_dpt_id1, emp_dpt_id2, emp_status, emp_role, emp_mobile, emp_hometelno, emp_cmptelno, emp_mail, emp_fax, emp_addr, emp_workingplace, emp_birthday, emp_remarks, emp_rrno, emp_jobduty, emp_jobposition, emp_jobrank, emp_gen, emp_interests FROM employee where emp_cmp_id = #{empCmpId} and emp_no != #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_room SET cnt = chat_room.cnt +1 WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}
UPDATE chat_room SET cnt = chat_room.cnt -1 WHERE chat_room_no = #{chatRoomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CM_CHAT_ROOM_NO, CREATE_DATE, CM_EMP_NO, CM_MESSAGE, EMP_NAME FROM CHAT_MESSAGE JOIN EMPLOYEE ON (CM_EMP_NO = EMP_NO) WHERE CM_CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_message SET CM_LAST_CHECK = CONCAT(CM_LAST_CHECK, ','||#{empNo}) WHERE CREATE_DATE = ( SELECT B.CREATE_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CM_CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) B WHERE B.RNUM = '1' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CM_CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
SELECT MAX(B.RNUM) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT * FROM CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CM_CHAT_ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC) A ) B WHERE CM_LAST_CHECK LIKE '%'||#{empNo}||'%'
